title: How A.I. could change the future of work
description: With artificial intelligence tools becoming more and more accessible, will companies use the new technology to increase productivity--or to reduce labor costs?

title: Actively managed funds come with unique risks and rewards. Here's how investors can pick a winner
description: Actively managed funds can outperform during periods of volatility, but investors will have to do their due diligence.

title: House votes to restore solar panel tariffs, Biden vows to veto bill if it passes Senate
description: The president's tariff moratorium was imposed as a bridge to boost U.S. solar manufacturing capacity while accelerating clean energy development.

title: Mark Cuban says he could get people to pay $100 for Twitter's blue checkmarks—Elon Musk's strategy is a 'huge mistake'
description: Billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban said Elon Musk made a "huge mistake" with Twitter's new blue checkmark system. Here's what he recommended instead.

title: Tech earnings calls show mega-cap companies going big on A.I. as they cut costs elsewhere
description: In their calls with analysts this week, Alphabet, Microsoft, Amazon and Meta emphasized their hefty investments in large language models.

title: First Republic most likely headed for FDIC receivership, sources say; shares drop 20%
description: The stock has fallen more than 90% this year as investors have lost confidence in the bank after two regional lenders failed in March.

title: Key inflation gauge for the Fed rose 0.3% in March as expected
Euro zone economy ekes out 0.1% growth in first quarter, misses expectations as Germany stagnates
description: The euro zone has published first quarter gross domestic product figures.

title: Ukraine should use China as leverage to help win the war with Russia, minister says
description: Ukraine's finance minister said Kyiv should use its bilateral relationship with China as leverage to help bring an end to Russia's full-scale invasion.

title: China's top leaders say the economy doesn't have enough 'internal' drive
description: China's top leaders said at a regular meeting Friday that domestic demand is still insufficient, according to state media.

title: Sony posts record annual profit boosted by chips and all-time high PlayStation 5 sales
description: Sony said it sold 19.1 million PlayStation 5 units in its fiscal year, beating its own forecast of 18 million units.

title: China's A.I. chatbots haven't yet reached the public like ChatGPT did
description: More than two months since the ChatGPT craze hit China, a similar artificial intelligence-based product has yet to reach the country's population at large.

title: IMF warns of 'disorderly' house price corrections in Europe as interest rates move higher
description: The IMF said that the European Central Bank needs to be increasing rates until mid-2024 to fight inflation.

title: Wall Street predicted a big surge for oil this year. But prices are now lower
description: Macroeconomic concerns have once more deflated oil prices near $80 barrels per day, despite a further voluntary cut coordinated by some OPEC+ members.

title: Microsoft is betting its future on cloud gaming — but that's what tripped up the Activision deal
description: U.K. regulators fears that Microsoft could in future withhold its blockbuster Call of Duty, Warcraft and Diablo titles from other cloud gaming platforms.

title: Obesity drug industry could be worth $200 billion within the decade, says Barclays, as market valuations grow
description: The burgeoning weight-loss drug industry could be worth as much as $200 billion within the next decade, according to Barclays bank.

title: Swiss National Bank to face Credit Suisse and climate protests at fraught AGM
description: The Swiss National Bank will face protests on Friday over its action on climate change and its role in the emergency sale of Credit Suisse to UBS.

title: Bank of Japan sticks to negative rates while announcing policy review
description: Governor Kazuo Ueda of the Bank of Japan chaired his first monetary policy meeting this week.

title: China's top chipmaker will 'struggle' to make cutting-edge chips competitively
description: SMIC is key to China's chip ambitions but it may struggle to produce cutting-edge semiconductors at an efficient level if it cannot access advanced equipment.

title: China just called Ukraine for the first time in the war. The timing wasn't accidental, analysts say
description: The timing of Xi's call to Ukraine — and China's decision to send emissaries to Ukraine — has raised eyebrows among political and defense analysts.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Markets had their best day in months
description: Tech shares and a soft domestic growth number gave U.S. markets the best day they've had in months.
